title: The Big Herc Interview: 10 Years in Prison for Robbery, Doing Adult Films, Blowing up on Youtube
description:
Big Herc gives a captivating interview where he talks about turning his life around after doing time, robbery, street life, hustlin, adult content, changing his ways, building his business, fitness, meeting his wife, now leading by example, giving back and more!
https://www.instagram.com/bigherc916/
https://twitter.com/bigherc916
